title: [GAMEPLAY] Yorick makes Quinn respawn as Valor permanently and unable to revert.
body:
When Yorick ults Quinn, then Quinn respawns off of Yorick ult, and then ults during that limited time, she becomes Valor permanently. She loses the movespeed buff on respawn, but has all of the Valor-form abilities and Valor's attack range. When her ult is off cooldown, it lists itself as the reactivation portion, but does nothing and doesn't revert. Her Harrier passive is still active in this state. Basically, the stuff you lose that Valor normally has means you're completely screwed.

Steps to repeat:
1) Yorick ults Quinn
2) Quinn "dies"
3) Quinn comes back because of Yorick ult
4) Quinn ults
5) Quinn is now perma-bird
